name: GeneralSurgery
title: General Surgery
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for procedures of general surgery including non-cardiac thoracic and abdominal procedures.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for thoracic and abdominal general surgery, except for cardiac procedures.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
